subject: Re: King Kong Digital Project | We're Ready to Launch | Artiste
preview: Andy has resolved in inbox. Adding time.  (Time: 30mins)

full_threads.body:
Andy has resolved in inbox. Adding time.

(Time: 30mins)

Hi Andy,

Thank you! We were able to send the LP live. Appreciate your support.

Kind regards,
Jonnie.

*Jonnie White*

Web Project Manager

Level 1, 12 River St.

South Yarra, Victoria, 3141, Australia

Ph. 1300 858 250

D: 03 7065 6704

www.kingkong.co <http://www.kingkong.co/au>

<https://www.facebook.com/kingkongco/>
<https://www.linkedin.com/company/kingkong>
<https://www.instagram.com/kingkong.com.au/>

Hi Jonnie,

Confirming this is added.

Thanks,
Andy

*

>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>> and design are likely to incur an additional charge.
